name: CombinedLearning
goal: Coaching and training on European Institutions workflow and cooperation. Coaching and training on European politics and political dynamics. Both including the cooperation at all levels from member states to EU Institutions and Authorities. Case oriented consulting and advisory services are delivered as part of the overall aim of coaching and learning clients.
interests: Agriculture, Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Energy, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Migration and asylum, Single market
euInitiatives:
Energy policies, financial services in general
Specifically the proposal for a European Covered Bonds directive and Covered Bonds regulation
